meta.title: {{name}} on ENS
meta.description: {{name}}'s profile on the Ethereum Name Service

empty.title: Personalize your profile
empty.description: Add crypto addresses, social links, an avatar and more!

available.title: {{name}} is available
available.description: This name expired on {{date}}. Click here to view the registration page.

desynced.title: Name misconfigured
desynced.description: This name is already owned, but a transaction is required to repair the ownership display. Extending the expiry – even by a single day – will restore accurate ownership information.
desynced.descriptionGracePeriod: This name is already owned, but a transaction is required to repair the ownership display. Extending the name past the grace period will restore accurate ownership information.

setAsPrimaryName.label: Set as primary name
setAsPrimaryName.title: Set your primary name
setAsPrimaryName.description: To set your primary name to this name, the ETH address must match this address.

reclaim.label: Recreate name
reclaim.warning: This subname has expired and is not owned. You can recreate this subname.

warnings.wrappedDNS: DNS names can be reclaimed by the DNS owner at any time. Do not purchase DNS names.
warnings.offchain: Offchain names do not currently appear in your 'Names' list. Learn more
warnings.homoglyph: This name contains non-ASCII characters. There may be characters that look identical or very similar to other characters, which could be used to deceive readers. Learn more about homoglyphs

warning.ownerNotManager: You are the owner but not the manager. This may be unintended if you’ve recently recieved this name from another address.
warning.managerNotParentOwner: The owner of {{parent}} can change ownership, roles, and settings. They cannot change the profile.
warning.managerNotDNSOwner: You are the Manager but not DNS Owner of this name. DNS names can be reclaimed by the DNS Owner at any time. You can send this name to the Owner, or update the DNS record to match.
warning.dnsOwnerNotManager: You cannot make changes to this name because you are the DNS Owner, but not the Manager. You can sync the manager to fix this.

grace-period.title: Grace period ends
grace-period.tooltip: A 90 day grace window after expiration, when the name can still be extended but not re-registered.

contract.title: Contract address
contract.tooltip: The address of the contract that enables Wrapped ENS names.
contract.warning: Some apps may show the contract address as the owner. This doesn't affect your ownership.

tooltips.owner: The owner of this name. The owner cannot change the profile.
tooltips.parent-owner: The owner of this name's parent ({{parent}}).
tooltips.dns-owner: The owner of this name, as set by DNS records. The owner cannot change the profile.
tooltips.manager: The address that can change the profile, settings and profile editors.
tooltips.profile-editor: An addres that can only change the profile
tooltips.subname-manager: An address or contract responsible for subname renewals.
tooltips.eth-record: The address that will receive funds sent to this name on mainnet.
tooltips.grace-period: A 90 day grace window after expiration, when the name can still be extended but not re-registered.
tooltips.contract-address: The address of the contract that enables Wrapped ENS names.
tooltips.namewrapper: The contract that enables Wrapped ENS names.

permissions.name: Permissions
permissions.parentUnlockedWarning: You cannot change permissions on this name. You must first revoke ‘unwrap this name’ on the parent ({{parent}}). Click here to view the parent’s permissions.

parentCanControl.label: This name can be controlled by its parent (<parentLink>{{parent}}</parentLink>)

list.title: The owner of the parent name can:
list.item1: Control and modify the settings and records
list.item2: Retake or reassign ownership of this name

parentCannotControl.label: This name cannot be controlled by its parent (<parentLink>{{parent}}</parentLink>)
parentCannotControl.sublabel: The owner of the parent name cannot control, modify, remove or retake ownership of this name.

list.title: The name owner will retain ownership unless one of the following happens:
list.item1: The name expires on {{date}} (can be extended)
list.item3: Ownership of the name is sent to another address

parentCanChange.label: The parent of this name (<parentLink>{{parent}}</parentLink>) can change permissions

ownerCanChange.label: The owner of this name can change permissions

ownerCannotChange.label: The owner of this name cannot change permissions

unwrapWarning.message:
Unwrap permissions must be revoked on the parent ({{parent}}) before giving up parent control.
Go to parent permissions

canExtendExpiry.label: Can extend expiry
canExtendExpiry.description: This names permission expiry can be extended by the {{managerOrOwner}}.
canExtendExpiry.description_date: This names permission expiry ({{date}}) can be extended by the {{managerOrOwner}}.

cannotExtendExpiry.label: Cannot extend expiry
cannotExtendExpiry.description: This names permission expiry cannot be extended by the manager.
cannotExtendExpiry.description_date: This names permission expiry ({{date}}) cannot be extended by the manager.

subtitle.parent-can-change: The parent of this name (<parentLink>{{parent}}</parentLink>) can change settings on this name.
subtitle.owner-can-change: The owner of this name can change settings on this name.

canUnwrap.label: Can unwrap this name
canUnwrap.description: The {{owner}} of this name can unwrap this name.

cannotUnwrap.label: Cannot unwrap this name
cannotUnwrap.description: The {{owner}} of this name cannot unwrap this name.

canCreateSubnames.label: Can create subnames
canCreateSubnames.description: The {{owner}} of this name can create new subnames.

cannotCreateSubnames.label: Cannot create subnames
cannotCreateSubnames.description: The {{owner}} of this name cannot create new subnames.

canSend.label: Can send this name
canSend.description: The {{owner}} of this name can send it to a new owner.

cannotSend.label: Cannot send this name
cannotSend.description: The {{owner}} of this name cannot send it to a new owner.

canSetResolver.label: Can set the resolver
canSetResolver.description: The {{owner}} of this name can set and change the resolver.

cannotSetResolver.label: Cannot set the resolver
cannotSetResolver.description: The {{owner}} of this name cannot set and change the resolver.

canSetTTL.label: Can set TTL
canSetTTL.description: The {{owner}} of this name can set and change the TTL.

cannotSetTTL.label: Cannot set TTL
cannotSetTTL.description: The {{owner}} of this name cannot set and change the TTL.

canApprove.label: Can change renewal manager
canApprove.description: The owner of this name can change the manager approved to renew subnames.

cannotApprove.label: Cannot change renewal manager
cannotApprove.description: The owner of this name cannot change the manager approved to renew subnames.

fuses.label: Fuses
fuses.info: You must burn 'Can unwrap' in order to burn other fuses
fuses.callToAction: Please wrap your name to unlock this feature

permissions.label: Permissions
permissions.warning: Fuses can be changed by the parent

dnsOwnerWarning.isDnsOwner: You cannot make changes to this name because you are the DNS Owner, but not the Manager. You can sync the manager to fix this.
dnsOwnerWarning.isManager: You are the Manager but not DNS Owner of this name. DNS names can be reclaimed by the DNS Owner at any time. You can send this name to the Owner, or update the DNS record to match.

token.label: Token
token.unwrappedText: Wrapping your name gives it new features and functionality, however some functionality on your name will change. Please make sure you understand these changes before wrapping your name.
token.unwrapWarning: This name has revoked the permissions needed for this action.
token.tooltip: The Name Wrapper enables additional functionality on ENS names.

bankless.title: Bankless Reminders
bankless.enterEmail: Receive Bankless Reminders through Email, PUSH, XMTP, Blockscan Chat, and Mailchain.
bankless.emailConfirmation: You're almost done. Please check your email to confirm your subscription.

sendName.title: Send Name
sendName.description: Sending a name will give the new address control over it
sendName.makeOwnerDescription: The owner can send to a new owner and change the manager
sendName.makeManagerDescription: The manager can change and set records.
sendName.inputPlaceholder: Enter an Ethereum address or ENS name

wrap.description: Upgrading or "wrapping" your name gives it new features.
wrap.boxDescription: Upgrading your name unlocks the latest functionality of ENS

descriptions.controller: Controls all the records of the name

records.label: Records
records.editRecordsDisabled: Current resolver is not compatible with wrapped names

addSubname.title: Subnames let you create additional names from your existing name.

errors.expiringSoon: The grace period for this name ends on {{date}}. If it isn’t extended before this date, it will become available for registration.
errors.notMigrated: This name is not migrated to the new registry.
errors.featureNotAvailable: Some features are not yet available, but you can still
errors.featureNotAvailableLink: view this name in the old app.
errors.migrationNotAvailable: Migration to the new registry is not available yet, but you can still
errors.migrationNotAvailableLink: migrate this name in the old app.
errors.addressLength: If address it should be 42 characters long
errors.permissionRevoked: This name has revoked the permissions needed to perform this action.
errors.gracePeriod: This cannot be done because the name has expired
errors.isOwnerCannotEdit: You must be the manager in order to edit the profile
errors.cannotEdit: You do not have permission to update to an authorised resolver
errors.isOwnerCannotVerify: You must be the Manager to verify your profile
errors.cannotVerify: You do not have permission to verify your profile
